goals__remit:
The Climate Bonds Initiative is an investor-focused not-for-profit organisation promoting investment in climate change solutions.  
The Climate Bonds Initiative is developing: 
- Proposals for government architecture — regulatory mechanisms, tax policies, green banks — that will support a rapid scaling up of investment. 
- Models for engineering investibility in projects and assets necessary for a rapid transition to a low-carbon economy. 
- Projects to demonstrate how to engineer that investibility. 
 
One of the Initiative’s main projects is the development of an International Standards and Certification Scheme for Climate Bonds. The aims of the Scheme are to: 
- Provide assurance for investors about the environmental integrity of climate bonds. 
- Provide governments with an easy-to-use tool to prioritize investments that address their climate change policy imperatives. 
- Support liquidity for climate bonds in secondary markets, as secondary markets are a pre-requisite for attracting institutional investors to the climate bonds market.
